Class BatchImageEngine.NavigateDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
      • BatchImageEngine.NavigateDirectory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.nio.file.FileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
    Enclosing class:
    BatchImageEngine

    private class BatchImageEngine.NavigateDirectory
extends java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
    An inner class extending SimpleFileVisitor navigates the source directory and extracts metadata from image files on the fly.

                      java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attr)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      common.ImageReadErrorException
        Processes the specified file and adds to the data structure according to the file signature for efficient retrieval.
        Parameters:
        fpath - the path representing the file to be checked
        attr - the attributes of the file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file
        common.ImageReadErrorException - in the event of image parsing problems

      • determineDateTaken

        private java.nio.file.attribute.FileTime determineDateTaken(java.nio.file.Path fpath,
                                                            java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attr)
        This method takes into account the presence of a user-provided Date Taken attribute and updates it if necessary. If the attribute is empty, it defaults to the file's last modified time.
        Parameters:
        fpath - the path representing the file to be checked
        attr - the attributes of the file
        Returns:
        a FileTime instance containing the date and time information

      • searchFiles

        private void searchFiles(java.lang.String[] files)
                  throws BatchErrorException
        Searches for specific image files in the source directory based on the specified list and prepares them for copying.
        Parameters:
        files - an array of image files to search for
        Throws:
        BatchErrorException - if an error occurs during the file search or processing

      • visitFile

        public java.nio.file.FileVisitResult visitFile(java.nio.file.Path fpath,
                                               java.nio.file.attribute.BasicFileAttributes attr)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Visits a file in the directory, extracts metadata and adds it to the imageSet.
        Specified by:
        visitFile in interface java.nio.file.FileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
        Overrides:
        visitFile in class java.nio.file.SimpleFileVisitor<java.nio.file.Path>
        Parameters:
        fpath - the path of the file to visit
        attr - the attributes of the file
        Returns:
        FileVisitResult.CONTINUE to continue visiting the directory
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the file
